name: Negative Norman
description:
Norman doesn't have many good traits. He is not a good person. He doesn't like people and he really doesn't like smiling. He didn't even want to go to the hypnotist in the first place. Hypnotism won't work.

Negative Norman is a tiny platforming game about a guy trying to become a better person. It started off as a school assignment, but turned into a much more personal project somewhere along the way.

Credits

Game by:

Vuk M. Takimoto

Music by:

Soundwave Trax (Drax)

8 bit Eskes
